N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.6 - Weapons and dangerous instruments

State Regulations

No weapon, dangerous instrument, or any other item intended
for use as a weapon may be carried in or on any transportation facility or
motor vehicle and/or rail car owned by the authority or a subsidiary
corporation. This provision does not apply to law enforcement personnel and
persons to whom a license for such weapon has been duly issued and is in force
(provided in the latter case the weapon is concealed from view). For the
purposes hereof, a weapon or dangerous instrument shall include, but not be
limited to, a firearm, switchblade knife, gravity knife, boxcutter, straight
razor or razor blades that are not wrapped or enclosed in a protective
covering, sword, shotgun, rifle, stun gun or bow and arrow. Notes
